text_block_list.name: Sky's Classmate
text_block_list.text: Hey, Sei-chan! Can't believe the Droite is tomorrow! I figured I'd go too. Good luck!

text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Sky-san, I'm a little jealous that you get to duet with Fuji-san. I'm excited to see what kind of dance it'll be.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wow, talk about pressure! Maybe I should run for it.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: So that everyone can start the year fresh and have fun… I want to do absolutely everything I can.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Anyway, with you as my partner, I realized I could make everyone's smiles that much brighter.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I really don't care about this stuff. I'm okay with not living up to people's expectations, and whether they have a good time or not isn't my problem. Much less if they're smiling.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: …… Faah～

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Well, the honeymoon is almost over. Unfortunately, this will be our last lesson. Today, we'll refine the details, and prepare for the big day.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: We've gone along with the form I suggested initially, And everything's gone well until now. Sky, is there anything you'd like to do?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: When you put it that way… Can we stop?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I just don't want to do it anymore, see.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I don't like the idea of meeting people's expectations. Do you mind if I do it my way instead?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Sky!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I might end up changing stuff based on my ideas, But if you're fine with that… I'll return the question. Won't you be my date?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Of course, it's my pleasure. We'll suprise and delight everyone with our dancing!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: So they're legit.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: But, they're dancing as a pair? Huh.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: That was…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Yeah! That was great! It'll certainly surprise them too! I really enjoy dancing like this.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: The only problem is the music… The style we have now is classical. But our dancing is more precise to the rhythm now, so it doesn't fit.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: But on the other hand, if we go too far pop… It won't match the atmosphere of the Droite. It would be nice if we could find a middle ground.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Maybe if I did some sampling, With an undertone of classical… I'll have to keep the strings tight.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Wait, it'd go well with the track I'm making now, actually. Calling it an instrumental might be a little much, but if I arrange it…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Then, how about we forget the music?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: How the hell could you?!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Shakur! What's wrong, for you to be so agitated?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: That doesn't matter. Seiun Sky, you said why don't we forget the music, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Huh? Um, yeah. I guess…

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: I can tell you right now that's too hardcore. It's basically a rule. No sound and there's no rhythm to follow. If I can just sync this up real quick…

text_block_list.name: Shakur
text_block_list.text: Huooh～!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Try dancing, so I can fix the timing.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: (This might actually…)

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: It worked! Really well, actually. Dancing to that felt good. Right, Sky?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Shakur-san, you write music? I had no clue. Don't tell me you upload it somewhere online…?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: I don't.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Now that Shakur is helping, we're a hundred times better off. There isn't much time left, So let's practice 'til we have it down!
The new direction for the dance, as well as your announcement…

text_block_list.name: Member of Student Council
text_block_list.text: …have resulted in many more students attending this year!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I see. Thank you for your report. I suppose it's time we get going as well.

text_block_list.name: Student Host
text_block_list.text: Everyone, may I have your attention! It's almost time for the Ligne Droite's famous event… Without further ado, the paired dance!

text_block_list.name: Student Host
text_block_list.text: …That's what I'd normally say, But the Droite will be a little different this year! Let me introduce the dancers participating in the exhibition.

text_block_list.name: Student Host
text_block_list.text: Our pair will be Fuji Kiseki and Seiun Sky!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: There must be some worth, for you to be involved. Show me what you've got.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: … Ah

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Damn it, I shouldn't have bothered. I was stuck there while they wasted my time.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: I finished off my ramen putting together an instrumental for you. Don't half-ass it, alright?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Then, shall we begin? What do you say, my date?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Let's make it fun.
